sentence.Network_en: The Arkansan nodded understandingly and said, " Yep. I had a truck like that once.
sentence.Network_cn: ”那阿肯色人点了点头,满理解的样子,说, “ 是啊, 我有过一辆卡车也是那么大. ”

sentence.Network_en: For example: A Texan was boasting to an Arkansan about his ranch.
sentence.Network_cn: 例如: 有一个得克萨斯人对一个阿肯色人吹嘘自己的牧场.
